attributes.action: Mr Cameron should step down as leader of the conservative party after his remarks towards UKIP
attributes.additional_details:
David Cameron to Resign

Responsible department: Cabinet Office

We the undersigned petition for the resignation of David Cameron
Mr Cameron's remarks on UKIP as being a racist party is totally unacceptable. This shows he is out of touch with the british people and he like Chelsea Football club go around accusing people of wrong doing because they are not accountable for their own actions.
We call for all government ministers and back benchers to put pressure on Mr Cameron to step down with Immediate effect

We call for the resignation of David Cameron and her Majesty the Queen should now dissolve government and call for a general election
